content: work next round with cc 60 double_crochet 3 round 8 with cc chain 1 single_crochet in ea double_crochet around drop cc pick up mc & join as before ready to work next round with mc 60 single_crochet round 9 increase round with mc chain 3 double_crochet in same st at base of beg chain double_crochet in ea of next 4 single_crochet *2 double_crochet in next single_crochet double_crochet in ea of next 4 single_crochet repeat from * around drop mc pick up cc & join as before ready to work next round with cc 72 double_crochet round 10 with cc chain 1 single_crochet in ea double_crochet around drop cc pick up mc & join as before ready to work next round with mc 72 single_crochet round 11 with mc chain 3 double_crochet in ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch drop mc pick up cc & join as before ready to work next round with cc 72 double_crochet rnds 12-17 repeat rnds 10-11 at end of round 17 fasten_off and cut mc leaving 6 tail for weaving in later continue with cc only for remainder of hat round 18 with cc chain 1 single_crochet in ea double_crochet around join with slip_stitch round 19 chain 3 double_crochet in ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch round 20 chain 1 single_crochet in ea double_crochet around join with slip_stitch fasten_off and weave in all tails variation for a decorative edge work one final round of reverse single_crochet copyright 2017 2011 2009 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 4
